title: Bounding box always shifted comparing to darknet results
body:
Hi
I have been testing this keras implementation for last couple of weeks.
Generally speaking the inference results are great.
But I also noticed the bbox, especially for person detection, are always shifted down, missing part of the head and too much space below the foot. Today I finally compared it with the inference result using darknet, and it confirms that darknet doesn't have this issue.
I double checked that I was using the same yolo3.weights, which was trained from COCO dataset

I guess it's due to image resize or post processing issues. Any idea how to fix it?
Thanks
